channel.title: Golang on Etienne Burdet
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on Etienne Burdet

item.title: 3615 Smart City
item.description: Since yesterday, it’s all the rage for CityMapper, Transit and the like in Paris. The RATP has decided to close back their data, until they really re-open it again late 2016. The official reason is that “RATP is thinking about a way to monetize his data”. This problem is not specific to the RATP actually, but may apply to anything smartcity and is as old as the profitable internet. I call it the “Minitel way of the smartcity” issue (for the non-french of you, read what the Minitel was).
